definitions.title: Hiphp.
definitions.body: make oneself a daughter's husband (NH Hithp. id., Aram. Ithpa. id.)—Pf. 2 mpl. [[וְהִתְחַתַּנְתֶּם]] consec. Jos 23:12; Impf. [[וַיִּתְחַתֵּן]] 1Ki 3:1, 2Ch 18:1; 2 m. [[תִּתְחַתֵּן]] De 7:3, 1Sa 18:21; Imv. [[הִתְחַתֵּן]] 1Sa 18:22, [[הִתְחַתְּנוּ]] Ge 34:9; Inf. [[הִתְחַתֵּן]] 1Sa 18:23 + 3 t.;—

make oneself daughter's husband (son-in-law) to, c. [[בְּ]] 1Sa 18:21, 1Sa 18:22, 1Sa 18:23, 1Sa 18:26, 1Sa 18:27; c. [[אֶת]] 1Ki 3:1, Ge 34:9 (P); c. [[לְ]] 2Ch 18:1, of marriage of Jehoshaphat's son and Ahab's daughter (cf. 2Ki 8:18 = 2Ch 21:6).
in gen. form marriage-alliance with, c. [[בְּ]] De 7:3 Jos 23:12 (D), Ezr 9:14.
